findings.issue: Should multiply by labor force participation rate, not total working age population
GDP impact calculation missing annual hours multiplier - should be hourly wage × hours × workers
Effects are additive but may interact multiplicatively in reality
Test bounds seem arbitrary without justification for these specific ranges

errorDetails.raw:
[FINDING]
Category: mathematical_accuracy
Severity: minor
Line: 64
Quote: "incomeEffect = inputs.incomeElasticity * (inputs.ubiAmount / (inputs.avgWage * inputs.baseWorkHours))"
Issue: Income elasticity formula assumes linear relationship which may not hold for large income changes
[/FINDING]
